attributes.additional_details:
This word does not exist and there have been multiple occasions where I needed precisely this word and I see no harm in and no reason why we shouldn't broaden our great dialect.

Thank you for taking the time to read my proposition.
Best Regards 
Will
attributes.background: Accept a new word into the English dialect and dictionary. the word would be "Waywordwithly" Definition: adjective: to be eloquent or to have a way with words.

rejection.details:
This is not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament. 

You may wish to contact the Oxford English Dictionary: https://www.oed.com/information/using-the-oed/contributing-to-the-oed
